Interface EngineSubscriber

Provides standardization of methods for Engine subscribe.

Index

Methods

  • subscribe
  • unsubscribe

Methods

subscribe

  • subscribe(engine: Engine, synchUp: boolean): void
    • Defined in davinci-eight/core/EngineSubscriber.ts:13

    Instructs the target to subscribe to context loss and restore events from the engine. The target will usually maintain and addRef a reference to the engine. The target will call addContextListener on the engine. If the synchUp parameter is true, the target will call the synchronize method on the engine.

    Parameters

    • engine: Engine
    • synchUp: boolean

    Returns void

unsubscribe

  • unsubscribe(): void
    • Defined in davinci-eight/core/EngineSubscriber.ts:19

    Instructs the target to unsubscribe from context loss and restore events from the engine. The target will call removeContextListener on the engine. The target will release its reference to the engine.

    Returns void
